name: Huo Li, Dawnhill Lao // Jiandiyu
text:
Haste
Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell that targets Huo Li, Dawnhill Lao, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

Whenever Huo Li, Dawnhill Lao blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, Huo Li, Dawnhill Lao deals damage equal to its power to that creature.
